title: Something about the Brain
content:
This morning I found (or it found me) this article about some brain:

[http://www.nytimes.com/2008/04/08/health/08brai.html?\_r=1&8dpc&oref=slogin](http://web.archive.org/web/20140629221840/http:/www.nytimes.com/2008/04/08/health/08brai.html?_r=1&8dpc&oref=slogin "http://www.nytimes.com/2008/04/08/health/08brai.html?\_r=1&8dpc&oref=slogin")

This seems very interested to me and I wonder if there is any case similar related to typography or design?

If you like to add something or comment about it that will be very welcome.

As to Boléro, here is the link:

[http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3-4J5j74VPw](http://web.archive.org/web/20140629221840/http:/www.youtube.com/watch?v=3-4J5j74VPw "http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3-4J5j74VPw")

Cause there is no way you will create something without Music, to help.  
Or vice-versa.

You will say "where is the type", it is a "PI"

Cheers!

André
author: AGL
